shade_families.label: Shade Families
shade_families.info: Comma'd list of values for default shade familes

globally_disable_quick_shop.label: Enable Quick Shop
globally_disable_quick_shop.info: If Quick Shop is disabled, all quick shop activating buttons on product cards will open PDP

redemption_image.label: Redemption Image
redemption_image.info: Select the image that will appear on the gift card redemption page

signup_slideout_thankyou_heading.label: Sign up thank you message heading

signup_slideout_thankyou_intro.label: Sign up thank you message introduction

enable_cordial.label: Enable Cordial
enable_cordial.info: Enables and disables the Cordial Javascript listener

script_url.label: Script URL
script_url.info: The URL of the script that will be embedded (this can change per cordial instance)

account_key.label: Account Key
account_key.info: The second argument in the after 'connect' in the crdl function, not to be mistaken by Connect URL, can be found in Cordial > Account Settings

enable_klevu.label: Enable Klevu
enable_klevu.info: Enables and disables the Klevu Javascript listener

enable_gorgias.label: Gorgias Live Chat
enable_gorgias.info: Enables and disables Gorgias Live Chat on the Live Chat page only

enable_ordergroove.label: Enable Ordergroove
enable_ordergroove.info: Enables and disables the Ordergroove snippets

nosto.label: Nosto
nosto.info: Enables and disables all nosto snippets and any associated sections

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

samples_limit.label: Sample Limit
samples_limit.info: If time allows, 0 would cancel the limit

newsletter_title.label: Sign up intro title
newsletter_title.info: Use span tag to create line break

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your images to be cropped.

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: Select image padding to make color visible.

video_url.label: Link
video_url.info: Videos play in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo link

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown
Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if collection has more products than shown

id.label: ID
id.info: Optional, for use with the Anchor Links Section

adapt_height_first_image.label: Adapt section height to first image size

button_label_1.label: First button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.

paragraph.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

enable_sticky_info.label: Enable sticky product information on large screens

paragraph.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

link-destination.label: Link Destination
link-destination.info: This field must be a kebab case string preceded by a pound symbol ex. #homepage-quick-links. This field must be unique per page and must correspond to the ID of a content section on this same page without the pound symbol.
